meanings.definition: (Obsolete spelling of ledger) A book in which things are recorded.
meanings.english_definition: An archaic spelling of ledger, referring to a book or other collection of financial accounts of a business.

examples.sentence: The Lger was kept up to date by the clerk.
examples.translation: その帳簿は事務員によって最新の状態に保たれていた。

usage_notes.explanation: This is an obsolete spelling and is not commonly used in modern English.

readability_explanation.text: This is an obsolete spelling of the word ledger. It is not commonly used in modern English.
